title: NSW South Coast Self-Contained Waterfront Cabin Stay with Resort-Style Pool & Splash Park
description:
Find your NSW South Coast serenity with a deluxe cabin stay at this relaxing holiday park, offering fun-seeking families and friends the perfect chance to explore the region’s golden beaches, lush inner bushland and crystal-clear central lake.

With each self-contained cabin comfortably fitting six or eight guests, this is the perfect group escape for travellers seeking the region’s best. After days spent kayaking, fishing, boating - with direct access to the resort’s boat ramp included - or bushwalking, return to a resort-style swimming pool, tennis courts and Splash Cafe, serving light lunches and fresh coffee.
offer_address: 1 Norman Street, Lake Conjola, New South Wales 2539, Australia

title: NSW South Coast Self-Contained Waterfront Stay with Resort-Style Pool & Splash Park
description:
Find your South Coast serenity with a stay at this relaxing holiday park, offering fun-seeking families and friends the perfect chance to explore the region’s golden beaches, lush inner bushland and central lake. Less than 10 minutes on foot brings you to Lake Conjola Bowling Club - think pub classics, cold drinks, a takeaway bottle shop and barefoot bowls.

With each self-contained cabin comfortably fitting six or eight guests, this is the perfect group escape for travellers seeking the region’s best. After days spent kayaking, fishing, boating - with direct access to the resort’s boat ramp included - or bushwalking, return to a resort-style swimming pool, tennis courts and Splash Cafe, serving light lunches and fresh coffee.
offer_address: 1 Norman Street, Lake Conjola, New South Wales 2539, Australia
